desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 經過幾輪問答後，優香同意讓愛麗絲成為正式成員。但她威脅說，如果還是做不出好遊戲就會關閉遊戲開發部。遊戲開發部全員再次前往廢墟尋找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.thai: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.ko: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.zh_tw: 優香首先偷偷問了愛麗絲“你是不是被遊戲開發部綁架來的”這個問題，被桃井和綠兩人攔下。優香不得不重新開始審問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Yuuka started questioning and Momoi fixed her eyes onto Aris nervously, yet Aris still made huge mistakes.
desc.jp: Yuuka started questioning and Momoi fixed her eyes onto Aris nervously, yet Aris still made huge mistakes.
desc.thai: Yuuka started questioning and Momoi fixed her eyes onto Aris nervously, yet Aris still made huge mistakes.
desc.ko: Yuuka started questioning and Momoi fixed her eyes onto Aris nervously, yet Aris still made huge mistakes.
desc.zh_tw: 優香開始提問，桃井則緊張地看著愛麗絲，然而即使這樣愛麗絲仍然出了差錯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香开始提问，桃井则紧张地看着爱丽丝，然而即使这样爱丽丝仍然出了差错。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香开始提问，桃井则紧张地看着爱丽丝，然而即使这样爱丽丝仍然出了差错。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香开始提问，桃井则紧张地看着爱丽丝，然而即使这样爱丽丝仍然出了差错。

desc.ko: BG_GameDevRoom.jpg Description
desc.zh_tw: BG_GameDevRoom.jpg Description

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.jp: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.thai: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.ko: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然說話很奇怪，但優香業已感受到愛麗絲對遊戲的熱愛，由此承認了她是遊戲開發部的一員。然而優香表示，由於規定突然變更，若月底拿不出成績，無論什麼社團都會被廢除。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.thai: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.ko: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.zh_tw: 優香走後，柚子從櫃子裡出來，表示要前往廢墟找到《G.Bible》一書。她同意桃井和綠兩人的想法，想要一起保護社團。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
